name: Stylesheet
Import from mqtt, extract variables, send to websocket, which has the name of the station
Open the Websocket out node. Ensure the path corresponds to the name of the node
This node red page was inspired by a Rocrail MQTT implementation and modified extensively from that implementation.
The Rocrail implementation is licenced as follows: CC Attribution-Share Alike 4.0 International  and we would like to acknowledge their inspiration.
Some code may still be identical to the Rocrail code.
